lead_paragraph: Defender Raul Albiol has extended his contract with Napoli until 2020, the Italian Serie A club said on Friday (www.sscnapoli.it).

headline.print_headline: Napoli Defender Albiol Extends Contract to 2020
headline.main: Napoli Defender Albiol Extends Contract to 2020
